case.title: .window_title
case.description: The text that appears on the title bar of the window. Default = "Alpha Anywhere".

case.title: .left
case.description: The horizontal pixel coordinate of the Alpha Anywhere window.

case.title: .top
case.description: The vertical pixel coordinate of the Alpha Anywhere window.

case.title: .width
case.description: The width of the Alpha Anywhere window in pixels.

case.title: .height
case.description: The height of the Alpha Anywhere window in pixels.
